lead_paragraph: In the interests of national defense, Government has asked industry to enter into various agreements with respect to prices and production which in ordinary times might have a very dubious standing before the anti-trust laws. But while this is going on in one section of Government, new moves to extend the scope of anti-trust action appear in others.
